definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: That chemical energy is then converted into electrical energy.
sentences.chinese: 這種化學能隨後轉化成電能。

sentences.english: The chemical quantum energy is a new type of energy source between chemical and nuclear energy.
sentences.chinese: 化學量子能是處在化學能與核能間的一個新層次。

sentences.english: Motor protein is a kind of small machines that convert chemical energy to mechanical works.
sentences.chinese: 分子馬達是一類將化學能轉化爲機械能的微小機器。
